content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'product' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dwh')
CREATE TABLE dwh.product
	(
	 [ProductKey] int,
	 [ProductName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [CategoryName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [SubcategoryName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [TotalOrder] bigint
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_product
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dwh.product
(ProductKey 1, ProductName 2, CategoryName 3, SubcategoryName 4, TotalOrder 5)
FROM 'https://ap203synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/data/gold/product_agg'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dwh.product
GO
